Buff1_Description: Bonus damage if next Skill cast is an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
Buff2_Description: Bonus damage if next Skill cast is a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill.
desc: {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage. Triple this bonus if an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill is the next Skill cast after a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill, or a  {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill is the next Skill cast after an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
name: Resonance
